seeker.name: Seeker
seeker.title: THE SEEKER
seeker.description:
Motivated by understanding, you want clarity before you move. Asking thoughtful questions, looking for patterns, and trying to make sense of what’s really going on beneath the surface is integral part of your nature. 

 Growth comes for you through insight, experimentation, and learning what actually works for you.

guardian.name: Guardian
guardian.title: THE GUARDIAN
guardian.description:
True to your name, you are oriented toward responsibility, stability, and care — for people, systems, and outcomes. You naturally hold things together, set boundaries, and make sure what matters stays protected. 

 Your growth edge is learning when support is shared — not carried alone.

flamebearer.name: Flamebearer
flamebearer.title: THE FLAMEBEARER
flamebearer.description:
You are driven by conviction and momentum — when something matters, you act. You bring energy, courage, and a push toward change, often motivating others just by moving first. 

 Your growth comes from learning how to channel intensity into sustainable progress, not burnout.

weaver.name: Weaver
weaver.title: THE WEAVER
weaver.description:
You naturally see connections — between people, ideas, and patterns others miss. You integrate perspectives, translate complexity, and help things work together more smoothly. 

 Growth for you comes from simplifying focus and choosing the one thread that matters right now.

questions.question: Which kind of moment makes you feel most alive?

options.text: A quiet aha when something finally clicks
Sitting with someone and just being there for them
Doing something brave, even if it scares me
Laying out a plan and watching it unfold like magic

questions.question: Which symbol is calling you right now?

options.label: A lightning bolt breaking through the clouds
A warm candle flame in a dark room
A golden thread weaving through stars

questions.question: Which of these speaks to your heart the most right now?

options.text: I want to understand myself better.
I want to feel more connected and grounded.
I want to feel brave and aligned with my truth.
I want to create a life that reflects my soul's vision.

questions.question: Which kind of magic feels closest to how you move through the world?

options.text: Asking powerful questions
Showing up fully for others
Shaking things up with heart
Designing a life that fits your soul

questions.question: How do you offer support when someone is hurting?

options.text: I give them clarity or insight they didn't see before.
I hold space and make them feel truly heard.
I give them the push to be bold and take action.
I help them see the bigger picture and move forward.

questions.question: Which truth feels most true for you right now?

options.text: I'm here to learn and grow.
I'm here to care and connect.
I'm here to live out loud.
I'm here to weave something meaningful.
